definitions.definition: A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.
A process or execution of a program.
definitions.example: The user killed the frozen task.

definitions.definition: To assign a task to, or impose a task on.
definitions.example: On my first day in the office, I was tasked with sorting a pile of invoices.

definitions.definition: To oppress with severe or excessive burdens; to tax.
To charge, as with a fault.
